The first high-level programming language was FORTRAN.
Java is a purely object oriented programming language.
The very first operating system to be developed was OS/360 by IBM.
JavaScript is a strongly typed language.
macOS is a flavor of Linux.
The first working prototype of the internet was called ARPANET.
Assembly is considered the lowest level programming language.
The field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed is called Machine Learning.
Microsoft Windows is based on UNIX.
Java is platform dependent.
The practice of using a network of remote servers hosted on the Internet to store, manage, and process data, rather than a local server or a personal computer is called Cloud Computing
Internet is decentralized.
